text: 🚨 New Report: America's Healthcare Affordability Crisis 💸🏥 Did you know? 🤔 Americans struggle to afford healthcare! 😱 Average max monthly payment: $97 💸 Many skip preventive care, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing 🤦‍♂️ What's the solution? 🤔 PayZen's AI-powered tech can help! 🔑 Unlock affordable healthcare for all! 💖
